```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)

N <- 100
x <- seq(0, 10, length.out = N)
e <- rnorm(N)
y <- 3.17 + 7.18 * x + e
inp_data <- tibble(x, y)
plot(inp_data, type = 'l')

priors <- prior(uniform(0, 10), class = Intersept) +
  prior(uniform(3, 15), class = b)

lin_fit <- brm(y ~ x, data = inp_data, refresh = 0)

summary(lin_fit)
plot(lin_fit)
```
